name: Five Nights: No Escape (Co-op)
description:
Five Nights: No Escape, another Horror Craze!


We have faithfully reproduced the core gameplay of the classic horror game - Five Nights at Freddy's, and added new features such as online cooperation mode and real-time voice chat, allowing you to relive the classic in a VR environment! Are you ready?


  • Immersive Experience: Immersive scenes and sound effects allow you to immerse yourself in horror and excitement from a first-person VR perspective, and continue to feel the adrenaline surge!
  • Online Cooperation: Scared of playing horror games alone? Don’t worry, call your friends and enjoy the fun of horror games together! Double the horror, double the excitement!
  • Real-time Voice Chat: Supports real-time voice chat to facilitate communication and cooperation with other teammates!
  • Realistic Physical Effects: Comfortable button interaction, simulating the most realistic feeling of physical collision!
  • Hidden Plots: Explore the unknown in the dark and unlock the ultimate secrets behind the mall and mascots!


We sincerely invite you to join the official Discord to meet other players online, share game experiences, make like-minded friends, and communicate with our development team at any time to obtain the latest development progress, as well as free keys, etc. Come and get it!

Let us enter this mysterious mall together, uncover the mysteries, explore the truth, and experience the unknown fear and excitement. Don't hesitate to join us for a real horror journey!
